name: Mirroria
description:
A mirrored vertical platformer where you battle through a randomly generated tower and encounter evil slimes. Collect coins to buy items and powerful weapons on your quest to defeat the Omnislime and find peace.

Use WASD to move.

Left and Right arrow keys to attack.

Q and E to switch item.

Shift to use/buy item.

Esc to pause and lave shop.

Enter to enter shops and advance dialogue.

Collect items and weapons throughout the playthrough to defeat the Omnislime!

Music and Sound effects made with zzfx and zzfxm.

https://github.com/cs17jjc/Mirroria
